name: proctoring-app
description: AI Proctoring Application with React and Node.js

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm install terser && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.render-build: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && npm install terser && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm install
